summary.span: 提供資訊，讓協助工具應用程式能用於為殘障使用者調整應用程式的使用者介面 (UI)。

span.span: Provides information that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's user interface (UI) for users with impairments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 協助工具應用程式可以調整來改善可用性不便的使用者應用程式的功能。Accessibility applications can adjust features of the application to improve usability for users with disabilities. 為有視力障礙的使用者，您可以調整以符合其需求的軟體和作業系統功能。For users who are visually impaired, you can adjust software and operating system features to comply with their needs. 例如，您可以放大文字和影像，並呈現對比。For example, you can enlarge text and images and render them with a contrast. 此外，您就可以配合色盲適當使用的色彩。In addition, you can accommodate color-blindness with the appropriate use of colors. 如果有嚴重視力障礙的使用者，電腦都可使用螢幕上轉譯的畫面檢閱輔助工具存取的語音或動態的可重新整理，Braille 顯示的文字。For users who are severely visually impaired, computers are accessible with screen review aids that translate on-screen text to speech or to a dynamic, refreshable, Braille display. 對於使用者而言是聽障人士，您可以設計使用閃爍的工具列中，例如的視覺提示的程式或者，您可以為文字顯示語音的訊息。For users who are hard of hearing, you can design programs that use visual cues, such as a flashing toolbar; or you can display spoken messages as text. 例如，當開啟時，`SoundSentry`在控制台中的協助工具選項 功能，提供視覺警告每當系統發出警示音效。For example, when turned on, the `SoundSentry` feature, an accessibility option in Control Panel, provides a visual warning whenever the system makes an alarm sound. 對於不便的使用者，您可以設計控制項可改善或消除使用鍵盤和滑鼠，藉此改善電腦協助工具。For users with motion disabilities, you can design controls that refine or eliminate keyboard and mouse use, thereby improving computer accessibility. 控制台中可提供協助。Control Panel offers assistance. 比方說，一種替代方法是將數字鍵台而非滑鼠，以瀏覽。For example, one alternative is to use the numeric keypad instead of the mouse for navigation. 另一個選項，稱為`StickyKeys`，可以讓使用者無法按住兩個或多個索引鍵 （例如 CTRL + P) 一次以一次輸入一個索引鍵來取得相同的結果。Another option, called `StickyKeys`, enables users who cannot hold down two or more keys at a time (such as CTRL+P) to get the same result by typing one key at a time. 具有認知的使用者和語言有助於行動不便人士，您可以設計以更加符合其需求的軟體程式。For users with cognitive and language disabilities, you can design software programs to better accommodate their needs. 例如，使用明顯或有提示排序、 簡單的顯示、 較少的字和目標小學標準讀取層級可以發揮這些使用者。For example, using conspicuous or cued sequencing, uncomplicated displays, fewer words, and a reading level targeted to elementary school standards can benefit these users. 針對具有拿取疾病的使用者，您可以設計軟體程式，以消除拿取的模式。For users with seizure disorders, you can design software programs to eliminate seizure provoking patterns. 如需有關存取範圍，包括資訊協助工具應用程式，請參閱 MSDN library 中或在 Microsoft 網站上的 Microsoft 協助工具的文件。For more information about accessibility, including information about accessibility applications, see the documentation for Microsoft Accessibility in the MSDN library or at the Microsoft Web site. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`隨安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To use the , you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. Windows Form 僅支援 Active Accessibility 2.0。Windows Forms only supports Active Accessibility 2.0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，當您使用這個方法來建立可存取物件時，您可以提供自己的實作的屬性和方法的類別提供您的應用程式特有的功能。Typically, when you use this method to create an accessible object, you are providing your own implementations of the properties and methods of the class to provide functionality specific to your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值類型屬性相依於具有鍵盤焦點的物件。The return value type of the property depends on the object that has keyboard focus. 下表描述的物件類型屬性會傳回。The following table describes the object types that the property returns. |類型Type|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`null`|這個物件沒有鍵盤焦點本身並不包含具有鍵盤焦點的子系。This object does not have the keyboard focus itself and does not contain a child that has the keyboard focus.| |整數integer|0，如果目前的物件具有鍵盤焦點。否則，子可存取物件具有鍵盤焦點的子識別碼。0 if the current object has keyboard focus; otherwise, the child ID of the child accessible object with keyboard focus.| ||可存取子物件具有鍵盤焦點。The child accessible object that has the keyboard focus.| 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列程式碼說明這值來呼叫時指定`Select`來執行複雜的選取作業。The following describes which values to specify when calling `Select` to perform complex selection operations. |運算Operation|旗標組合Flag Combination| |---------------|----------------------| |若要模擬按一下To simulate a click| OR OR | |若要藉由模擬按住 CTRL 並按一下選取的目標項目To select a target item by simulating CTRL+click| OR OR | |若要取消選取目標項目藉由模擬 CTRL + 按一下To cancel selection of a target item by simulating CTRL+click| OR OR | |模擬 SHIFT + 按一下To simulate SHIFT+click| OR OR | |選取某個範圍的物件，並將焦點放在最後一個物件To select a range of objects and put focus on the last object|指定上設定選取範圍的錨點開始的物件。Specify on the starting object to set the selection anchor. 然後呼叫一次選取並指定或上的最後一個物件。Then call Select again and specify OR on the last object.| |若要取消選取所有物件To deselect all objects|指定任何物件。Specify on any object. 這個旗標會取消選取所有選取的物件，除非選取。This flag deselects all selected objects except the one just selected. 然後呼叫一次選取並指定相同物件上。Then call Select again and specify on the same object.| 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性擷取物件的螢幕座標中的週框矩形。The property retrieves the object's bounding rectangle in screen coordinates. 如果物件具有非矩形的圖案，這個屬性代表最小完全包含在整個物件區域的矩形。If the object has a nonrectangular shape, then this property represents the smallest rectangle that completely encompasses the entire object region. 因此，矩形物件，例如清單檢視項目，此物件的週框的座標可以如果失敗測試，藉由呼叫方法，因為決定物件的界限，以像素 x 像素為基礎。Therefore, for nonrectangular objects such as list view items, the coordinates of the object's bounding rectangle can fail, if tested, by calling the method, because determines the object's boundaries on a pixel-by-pixel basis. ## Examples 下列範例將示範存取範圍感知的圖表建立控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何覆寫屬性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 取得描述物件之預設動作的字串。

span.span: Gets a string that describes the default action of the object.

summary.span: 並非所有的物件都有預設動作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

value.span: 物件預設動作的描述；若此物件沒有預設動作，則為 。

span.span: A description of the default action for an object, or if this object has no default action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串會描述不物件功能結果的物件執行的動作。The string describes the action that is performed on an object, not what the object does as a result. 也就是說，列印文件的工具列按鈕會有的預設動作是"Press"，而不是"會列印目前文件 」。That is, a toolbar button that prints a document has a default action of "Press" rather than "Prints the current document." 請勿混淆物件的預設動作的值。Do not confuse an object's default action with its value.

exception.span: 無法擷取控制項的預設動作。

span.span: The default action for the control cannot be retrieved.

span.para: 如果物件會包裝系統控制項的預設動作; 預設實作會傳回可存取物件的預設動作否則，它會傳回。執行動作的控制項應該支援這個方法。並非所有的物件有預設動作，而且有些物件可能會有相關的預設動作其屬性，如下列範例所示： 選取的核取方塊具有 「 取消核取 」 的預設動作而值為 「 已核取 」。已清除核取方塊具有 「 檢查 」 的預設動作，值是 「 未核取 」。標記為 「 列印 」 的按鈕不有任何值 」 按下 」 的預設動作。靜態文字控制項或編輯控制項，顯示"Printer"沒有預設動作，不過會有值為"Printer"。物件的屬性應該是動詞或短動詞片語。

The default implementation returns the accessible object's default action if the object wraps a system control that has a default action; otherwise, it returns . Only controls that perform actions should support this method. Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked." A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked." A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value. A static text control or an edit control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer." An object's property should be a verb or a short verb phrase.

span.para: 預設實作會傳回可存取物件的描述，如果物件會包裝系統控制項。否則，它會傳回。描述通常用於視力或眼盲的使用者提供更高的內容。它也可以使用內容搜尋或其他應用程式。伺服器必須支援屬性是否不明顯，描述，或者它是多餘根據物件的， ， ，和屬性。比方說，「 確定 」 按鈕不需要其他資訊，但是顯示圖片的仙人掌的按鈕。， ，也可能仙人掌按鈕的屬性會描述其用途，但屬性傳達是無形的例如 「 顯示圖片的仙人掌按鈕 」 的資訊。

The default implementation returns the accessible object's description if the object wraps a system control; otherwise, it returns . The description is typically used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users. It can also be used for context searching or other applications. Servers need to support the property if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's , , , and properties. For example, a button with "OK" does not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would. The , , and perhaps properties for the cactus button describe its purpose, but the property conveys information that is less tangible, like "A button that shows a picture of a cactus".

summary.span: 執行與這個可存取物件相關的預設動作。

span.span: Performs the default action associated with this accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端可以藉由檢查物件的擷取物件的預設動作屬性。Clients can retrieve the object's default action by inspecting an object's property. 用戶端可使用自動化 （如果支援） 而不是以執行物件的預設動作。A client can use automation (if supported) instead of to perform an object's default action. 不過，可讓您輕鬆地執行物件的最常用的動作。However, provides an easy way to perform an object's most commonly used action.

exception.span: 無法執行控制項的預設動作。

span.span: The default action for the control cannot be performed.

span.para: 系統提供的使用者介面項目所執行之預設動作取決於鍵盤的狀態。也就是說，如果輔助按鍵，例如 SHIFT、 ALT 或 CTRL 已關機 （無論是由使用者動作或以程式設計方式） 時呼叫時，預設值動作可能不是當這些索引鍵不是向下相同。並非所有物件都有預設動作。

The default action performed by system-provided user interface elements depends on the keyboard state. That is, if a modifier key such as SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL is down (either by a user action or programmatically) when is called, the default action might not be the same as when those keys are not down. Not all objects have a default action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鍵盤焦點的概念相關的作用中的視窗。The concept of keyboard focus is related to that of an active window. 使用中視窗是使用者正在使用的前景視窗。An active window is the foreground window in which the user is working. 使用中視窗或使用中視窗的子物件具有鍵盤焦點的物件。The object with the keyboard focus is either the active window or a child object of the active window. 只有一個物件或容器內的項目可以有焦點，一次。Only one object or item within a container can have the focus at any one time. 物件具有鍵盤焦點不一定選取的物件。The object with the keyboard focus is not necessarily the selected object.

span.para: 並非所有物件都必須支援這個屬性。一般而言，此屬性包含工具提示樣式的資訊，用來描述物件功能或如何使用它。例如，印表機可能會顯示的工具列按鈕屬性"會列印目前文件。 」文字屬性沒有使用者介面中是唯一的。伺服器不需要支援屬性如果其他屬性會提供物件的足夠資訊的用途和物件可能會執行哪些動作。

Not all objects need to support this property. Typically, this property contains ToolTip style information that is used either to describe what the object does or how to use it. For example, the property for a toolbar button that shows a printer might be "Prints the current document." The text for the property does not have to be unique within the user interface. Servers do not need to support the property if other properties provide sufficient information about the object's purpose and what actions the object might perform.

summary.span: 取得可存取物件的快速鍵或便捷鍵 (Access Key)。

span.span: Gets the shortcut key or access key for the accessible object.

value.span: 可存取物件的快速鍵或便捷鍵；物件如果沒有相關的快速鍵，則為 。

span.span: The shortcut key or access key for the accessible object, or if there is no shortcut key associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 便捷鍵也稱為助憶鍵是功能表、 功能表項目、 按鈕或一些其他控制項的標籤文字中加底線的字元。An access key, also known as a mnemonic, is an underlined character in the text of a menu, menu item, label of a button, or some other control. 比方說，使用者可以顯示功能表所按下 ALT 鍵，同時也按指定之底線的按鍵，例如 ALT + F，若要開啟`File`功能表。For example, a user can display a menu by pressing the ALT key while also pressing the indicated underlined key, such as ALT+F, to open the `File` menu. 若要使用功能表項目的存取金鑰，必須使用包含項目的功能表。To use the access key of a menu item, the menu containing the item must be active. 工具列按鈕和功能表項目等控制項通常會有相關聯的快速鍵。Controls such as toolbar buttons and menu items often have an associated shortcut key. 功能表項目可以有與其相關聯的快速鍵和便捷鍵。A menu item can have both an access key and a shortcut key associated with it. 如果值屬性為單一字元，您可以假設它是存取金鑰。If the value of the property is a single character, you can assume it is an access key.

exception.span: 無法擷取控制項的捷徑。

span.span: The shortcut for the control cannot be retrieved.

span.para: 有快速鍵或便捷鍵的所有物件應該都支援此屬性。
All objects that have a shortcut key or access key should support this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是用戶端用來識別、 搜尋或宣告為使用者物件的字串。The property is a string used by clients to identify, find, or announce an object for the user. 若要存取之子物件的名稱，您必須先呼叫與子系會擷取其名稱的索引。To access the name of a child object, you must first call with the index of the child whose name you are retrieving. ## Examples 下列範例將示範存取範圍感知的圖表建立控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何覆寫屬性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#6)]

exception.span: 無法擷取或設定控制項的名稱。

span.span: The name of the control cannot be retrieved or set.

span.para: 所有物件應該都支援此屬性。物件的名稱應該是直覺式，如此使用者了解物件的用途或意義。此外，請確定屬性是唯一相對於父項中任何同層級物件。資料表內的導覽呈現為部分使用者特別地困難的問題。因此，server 開發人員應該要資料表資料格名稱盡量具有描述性。例如，您可以建立資料格名稱合併的資料列和資料行，例如"A1"。 名稱不過，它通常最好是使用更具描述性的名稱，例如"李鈺，2 月 」。許多物件，例如圖示、 功能表、 核取方塊、 下拉式方塊和其他控制項，具有會向使用者顯示的標籤。向使用者顯示任何標籤應該用於物件的屬性。如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。如果您使用功能表或按鈕文字屬性，刪去連字號 (&)，標記鍵盤便捷鍵。

All objects should support this property. An object's name should be intuitive so that users understand the object's meaning or purpose. Also, ensure that the property is unique relative to any sibling objects in the parent. Navigation within tables presents especially difficult problems for some users. Therefore, server developers should make table cell names as descriptive as possible. For example, you might create a cell name by combining the names of the row and column it occupies, such as "A1." However, it is generally better to use more descriptive names, such as "Karin, February." Many objects, such as icons, menus, check boxes, combo boxes, and other controls, have labels that are displayed to users. Any label displayed to users should be used for the object's property. For more information, see the Property. If you are using menu or button text for the property, strip out the ampersands (&) that mark the keyboard access keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 巡覽、 空間和邏輯，會永遠限制容器內的使用者介面項目。Navigation, both spatial and logical, is always restricted to the user interface elements within a container. 使用空間巡覽時，用戶端可以瀏覽只有起始物件的同層級。With spatial navigation, clients can navigate only to a sibling of the starting object. 根據邏輯巡覽搭配使用的巡覽旗標，用戶端可以瀏覽到子系或同層級的起始物件。Depending on the navigational flag used with logical navigation, clients can navigate to either a child or to a sibling of the starting object. 這個方法不會變更選取範圍或焦點。This method does not change the selection or focus. 若要將焦點變更，或選取的物件，使用。To change the focus or to select an object, use . 方法會擷取僅使用者介面項目有已定義的螢幕位置。The method retrieves only user interface elements that have a defined screen location. ## Examples 下列範例將示範存取範圍感知的圖表建立控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼示範如何覆寫顯示方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#6)]

exception.span: 巡覽的嘗試失敗。

span.span: The navigation attempt fails.

span.para: 所有的視覺物件必須支援這個方法。如果物件具有狀態，巡覽至隱藏的物件可能會失敗。某些系統定義的介面元素，例如功能表、 功能表項目和快顯功能表可讓瀏覽不可見的物件。不過，其他的系統定義的使用者介面項目不支援此。可能的話，伺服器應該支援巡覽到物件是不可見的但這項支援不需要和用戶端不應預期它。

All visual objects must support this method. If an object has the state , navigation to this hidden object might fail. Some system-defined interface elements such as menus, menu items, and pop-up menus allow navigation to objects that are not visible. However, other system-defined user interface elements do not support this. If possible, servers should support navigation to objects that are not visible, but this support is not required and clients should not expect it.

summary.span: 修改選取或者移動可存取物件的鍵盤焦點。

span.span: Modifies the selection or moves the keyboard focus of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用這個方法來執行複雜的選取作業。Applications can use this method to perform complex selection operations. 下列程式碼說明這值來呼叫時指定來執行複雜的選取作業。The following describes which values to specify when calling to perform complex selection operations. |運算Operation|旗標組合Flag Combination| |---------------|----------------------| |若要模擬按一下To simulate a click| `OR` **注意：** 如果從自己的應用程式內呼叫，這種組合不會選取所要的控制項。 `OR` **Note:** This combination will not select the desired control if called from within your own application. 如果會有想要的效果，不過，從外部應用程式呼叫。It will have the desired effect, however, if called from an external application.| |若要藉由模擬按住 CTRL 並按一下選取的目標項目To select a target item by simulating CTRL + click| `OR` `OR` | |若要取消選取目標項目藉由模擬 CTRL + 按一下To cancel selection of a target item by simulating CTRL + click| `OR` `OR` | |模擬 SHIFT + 按一下To simulate SHIFT + click| `OR` `OR` | |選取某個範圍的物件，並將焦點放在最後一個物件To select a range of objects and put focus on the last object|指定上設定選取範圍的錨點開始的物件。Specify on the starting object to set the selection anchor. 然後呼叫一次，並指定 `OR` 上的最後一個物件。Then call again and specify `OR` on the last object.| |若要取消選取所有物件To deselect all objects|指定任何物件。Specify on any object. 這個旗標會取消選取所有選取的物件，除非選取。This flag deselects all selected objects except the one just selected. 然後呼叫一次，並指定相同物件上。Then call again and specify on the same object.| ## Examples 下列範例將示範存取範圍感知的圖表建立控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼示範如何覆寫顯示方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#6)]

exception.span: 無法執行選取。

span.span: The selection cannot be performed.

span.para: 所有物件都可以選取或接收鍵盤焦點必須都支援這個方法。
All objects that can be selected or receive the keyboard focus must support this method.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範存取範圍感知的圖表建立控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它並沒有任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何覆寫屬性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks `invokeAttr` 參數可能是建構函式、方法、屬性或欄位。The `invokeAttr` parameter may be a constructor, method, property, or field. 您必須指定適當的引動過程屬性。A suitable invocation attribute must be specified. 藉由將空字串 ("") 傳遞為成員名稱的方式，叫用類別的預設成員。Invoke the default member of a class by passing the empty string ("") as the name of the member. `modifiers`參數具有相同的長度為`args`參數，表示叫用的成員引數屬性中繼資料中。The `modifiers` parameter has the same length as the `args` parameter, representing the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata. 參數可以具有下列屬性： pdIn，pdOut，pdRetval，pdOptional，和 pdHasDefault。A parameter can have the following attributes: pdIn, pdOut, pdRetval, pdOptional, and pdHasDefault. 這些分別代表 [In]、[Out]、[retval]、[optional] 和預設參數。These represent [In], [Out], [retval], [optional], and a default parameter, respectively. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器應用程式可以呼叫此函式，當其包含自訂的 UI 物件類似於系統提供的物件。Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object. 伺服器應用程式呼叫`CreateStdAccessibleObject`並覆寫方法和屬性，視需要以符合其自訂物件。Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the methods and properties as needed to match their custom object. 這種方法將完整實作所有的工作儲存 server 開發人員屬性和方法。This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the properties and methods. 此函式是類似於`CreateStdAccessibleProxy`，不同之處在於`CreateStdAccessibleProxy`可讓您指定的類別名稱做為參數，而`CreateStdAccessibleObject`使用相關聯的類別名稱`hwnd`。This function is similar to `CreateStdAccessibleProxy`, except that `CreateStdAccessibleProxy` enables you to specify the class name as a parameter, whereas `CreateStdAccessibleObject` uses the class name associated with the `hwnd`. 呼叫此版本的`UseStdAccessible`等同於呼叫將兩個參數的版本與用戶端 objid。Calling this version of the `UseStdAccessible` is the same as calling the two parameter version with an objid of CLIENT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立可存取物件的方法和屬性之指定類型的系統提供的使用者介面項目。Creates an accessible object with the methods and properties for the specified type of system-provided user interface element. 伺服器應用程式可以呼叫此函式，當其包含自訂的 UI 物件類似於系統提供的物件。Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object. 伺服器應用程式呼叫`CreateStdAccessibleObject`並覆寫方法和屬性，視需要以符合其自訂物件。Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the methods and properties as needed to match their custom object. 這種方法將完整實作所有的工作儲存 server 開發人員屬性和方法。This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the properties and methods. 有效`objid`值。Valid `objid` values. |ObjectObject|值Value|描述Description| |------------|-----------|-----------------| |警示ALERT|0xFFFFFFF60xFFFFFFF6|是指與視窗或應用程式相關聯的訊息。Refers to a message associated with a window or application.| |插入號CARET|0xFFFFFFF80xFFFFFFF8|指的是文字插入列在視窗 （插入號）。Refers to the text insertion bar (caret) in the window.| |用戶端CLIENT|0xFFFFFFFC0xFFFFFFFC|指的是視窗工作區。Refers to the window's client area. 在大部分情況下，作業系統控制框架項目，用戶端物件，包含控制應用程式的所有項目。In most cases, the operating system controls the frame elements, and the client object contains all elements that the application controls.| |資料指標CURSOR|0xFFFFFFF70xFFFFFFF7|是指將滑鼠指標。Refers to the mouse pointer. 在系統中只有一個滑鼠指標，而且它不是子視窗。There is only one mouse pointer in the system and it is not a child of a window.| |HSCROLLHSCROLL|0xFFFFFFFA0xFFFFFFFA|指向視窗的水平捲軸。Refers to the window's horizontal scroll bar.| |MENUMENU|0xFFFFFFFD0xFFFFFFFD|指向視窗的功能表列。Refers to the window's menu bar.| |SIZEGRIPSIZEGRIP|0xFFFFFFF90xFFFFFFF9|指向視窗的調整大小底框，位於視窗框架的右上角的選擇性框架元件。Refers to the window's size grip, an optional frame component located at the lower right corner of the window frame.| |音效SOUND|0xFFFFFFF50xFFFFFFF5|是指聲音的物件。Refers to a sound object. 音效物件沒有畫面位置或子系，但沒有名稱和狀態屬性。Sound objects do not have screen locations or children, but do have name and state attributes. 它們是播放音效的應用程式的子系。They are children of the application playing the sound.| |SYSMENUSYSMENU|0xFFFFFFFF0xFFFFFFFF|指向視窗的 [系統] 功能表。Refers to the window's system menu.| |標題列TITLEBAR|0xFFFFFFFE0xFFFFFFFE|指向視窗的標題列。Refers to the window's title bar.| |VSCROLLVSCROLL|0xFFFFFFFB0xFFFFFFFB|指向視窗的垂直捲軸。Refers to the window's vertical scroll bar.| |視窗WINDOW|0x000000000x00000000|指的是視窗本身，而非子物件。Refers to the window itself rather than to a child object.|

summary.span: 取得或設定可存取物件的數值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of an accessible object.

value.span: 可存取物件的值，或者，如果未設定物件值，則為 。

span.span: The value of an accessible object, or if the object has no value set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，屬性表示視覺物件所含的資訊。Typically, the property represents visual information contained by the object. 並非所有物件都支援屬性。Not all objects support the property. 在大部分情況下，屬性用來告訴 visual 資訊的物件包含用戶端。In most cases, the property is used to tell the client about what visual information an object contains. 例如，編輯控制項的值是包含的文字，但功能表項目沒有任何值。For example, the value for an edit control is the text it contains, but a menu item has no value. 屬性可以提供階層式案例，例如樹狀檢視控制項中的資訊。The property can provide hierarchical information in cases such as a tree view control. 雖然在樹狀檢視控制項的父物件不提供中的資訊屬性，在控制項中的每個項目具有以零為起始的值，表示其在階層內的層級。Although the parent object in the tree view control does not provide information in the property, each item within the control has a zero-based value that represents its level within the hierarchy. 最上層項目的值為 0，第二個層級項目有值為 1，依此類推。Top-level items have a value of zero, second-level items have a value of one, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 傳回的值從捲軸和 trackbar 可存取物件會指出百分比，因此它們都是介於 0 和 100 (含) 之間的整數。The values returned from scroll bar and trackbar accessible objects indicate percentages, so they are integers between 0 and 100, inclusive.

exception.span: 無法設定或擷取數值。

span.span: The value cannot be set or retrieved.
